question_1_what_do_you_like_most: I love the new interface! It's much more intuitive and user-friendly. The navigation is clear and I can find everything I need quickly.
question_2_what_are_the_main_issues: The website is slow and sometimes crashes. This affects my productivity and makes it frustrating to use.
question_3_what_would_you_improve: I would improve the loading speed and add more customization options for the dashboard.
question_4_any_additional_feedback: The customer support team was amazing. They resolved my issue within minutes and were very professional.

question_1_what_do_you_like_most: The product quality has improved significantly. The materials feel more durable and the finish is much better than before.
question_2_what_are_the_main_issues: Pricing is too high compared to competitors. I understand the value but it's still difficult to justify the cost for our budget.
question_3_what_would_you_improve: I would like to see more flexible pricing options and better value communication.
question_4_any_additional_feedback: The delivery was fast and the packaging was excellent. Everything arrived in perfect condition.

question_1_what_do_you_like_most: I appreciate the regular updates and new features. The product keeps getting better and I'm excited about future improvements.
question_2_what_are_the_main_issues: I'm having trouble with the login process. It keeps asking me to reset my password even though I'm using the correct one.
question_3_what_would_you_improve: I would improve the authentication system and make it more user-friendly.
question_4_any_additional_feedback: The team is very responsive and helpful. They always answer my questions quickly and provide good solutions.
